name: Bigfeet of the Endless Forest
description:
Bigfeet of the Endless Forest

A 20-30 minute narrative game about two Bigfoot hunters, alone with one another on the outskirts of the Endless Forest. 

This is my first game project, made for a jam. I made it in Bitsy over the course of about four non-sequential days. It contains one (1) puzzle. 

I don't have any way of adding achievements, but please consider yourself to have achieved an achievement if you discover the stupid root beer joke.

If you like it, thanks! You can follow me on Twitter at @drewtmoffatt if you like. I am a writer. I don't usually make games but I write articles and columns about them a lot.
